results.description:
Praise for SPIDER: THE SECRET OF BRYCE MANOR:

Best Mobile Game - Indie Game Festival
Best iPhone Game - Indie Game Festival
Game of the Year - TouchArcade
Best of the Year - USA Today
Platform Game of the Year - IGN
"One of our top 3 iPhone games of all time." - boing boing

"There's really nothing as uniquely rewarding as tackling a hornet out of the air, or spinning an eight-point web." - Slide To Play
"The twin games — puzzle-action and mystery — work exceptionally well together." - IGN
"Gorgeous storybook-illustrated style that's remarkably unique for any game." - Offworld

---

In Spider: The Secret of Bryce Manor, you take on the role of a simple house spider. Make your way from the gardens into the mysterious abandoned home, building webs to catch your prey. Crawl up the walls and climb into crevices to find hidden surprises, and eat your fill of insects to grow strong. With intuitive touch controls, you'll be constructing massive webs with the flick of a finger.

As you make your way from room to room, your little spider will stumble across the pieces of the story of what happened to the former residents of Bryce Manor. Explore every room thoroughly to find every clue and solve the mystery the house holds within its walls. Be careful, though. There are other hunters around, and some of them have no problem making a quick lunch of you. You'll have to construct bigger and stronger webs to deal with some of the deadlier twists the game throws at you. With your human brain and spider skills, can you uncover the secret of Bryce Manor?

Uncover the Secret: Search every room thoroughly for clues about what happened in the abandoned manor. Observe your surroundings and solve puzzles to reveal the story!

Battle Nature: Not everything you catch in your web will lay down without a fight. Construct larger and stronger webs to ensnare bigger and deadlier prey!

Interesting Environments: Explore every inch of the house, from the garden to the attic and everything in between. Thread your webs across a kitchen, a dining room, and many more locations!

Intuitive Controls: Use touch controls to take full advantage of your arachnid agility and zip around rooms with ease. Assemble amazing webs with a few flicks your finger, or soar through the air in any direction you choose. Doing whatever a spider can has never been simpler!
**************************************************

GameClub is a subscription mobile gaming service. If you like our games, try our auto-renewing monthly subscription for 30 days free, and play all of our games with no limits, no ads, no hidden fees, and no other in-app purchases.

results.description:
* 5/5  "MUST BUY... builds an almost impossibly intricate web." -TouchArcade 

This sequel to the award-winning hit Spider: The Secret of Bryce Manor once again puts you in the role of an ordinary spider on an extraordinary adventure. Explore a massive estate, build intricate webs, and put your wits to the test with some incredibly mind-bending puzzles. Piece together clues and see if you can solve the mystery behind the Rite of the Shrouded Moon.

The adventure may be bigger than ever, but you're still just a little spider in a human's world. Slip under floorboards, through keyholes, and up to the rooftops for a spider's perspective on this dramatic tale told without words. Beware of other predators who will look to turn the tables on you. Search every nook and cranny for clues to figure out the secrets of the estate, some of which will require you to think outside of the confines of the game world. 

Arachnid Abilities: Leap with great speed and agility, spin spectacular webs, and use your ability to climb surfaces to ensnare your targets and feed your hunger!

Explore Everywhere: Spiders can get into places a human would never think of. Explore Blackbird Estate's 30 levels, each of which can be played in day or night, rain or shine,
each a new combination of gameplay, secrets and collectibles.

Real Time, Real Weather: Solve cryptic puzzles using the weather and the moon! Once the sun sets outside your window, it becomes night in the game. When it rains in real life, the rain also falls on Blackbird Estate. 

Mind-Bending Puzzles: You'll have to have sharp wits and excellent reasoning abilities to solve every mystery this time around!

Improved Controls: Search around rooms, zoom in and out, and use all of your spider skills with incredibly intuitive controls!

Multiple Spiders: Unlock and play as five different types of spiders. Choose your favorite web-spinner and try to catch every insect to complete your collection!

More praise for Spider: Rite of the Shrouded Moon

* 9/10  "Elegant, clever, subtle, mechanically unusual." -PocketGamer
* "Incredibly fun web-slinging, insect-catching action" -Destructoid
* "A substantial and steely game." -Rock Paper Shotgun
* “A new level of interactivity.” -Kill Screen Magazine
* "A quiet, careful joy." -Kotaku
* “A score-chasing arcade game and an ambitious narrative-driven puzzle game in one.” -Eurogamer
**************************************************
